intro.en: Your playful habits can inspire our design services. For instance, if you like stories or achievements, we can introduce service elements accordingly.
intro.it: I tuoi gusti in tema di giochi e entertainment possono ispirare il nostro design. Ad esempio, se ti piacciono le storie o le sfide, possiamo introdurre di elementi di questo genere nell’esperienza del servizio.
intro.el: Οι παιχνιδιάρχες συνήθειες σας μπορούν να εμπνεύσουν τις υπηρεσίες σχεδιασμού μας. Για παράδειγμα, αν σας αρέσουν ιστορίες ή επιτεύγματα, μπορούμε να εισαγάγουμε ανάλογα τα στοιχεία υπηρεσιών.
intro.fr: Vos habitudes ludiques peuvent inspirer nos services de design. Par exemple, si vous aimez les histoires ou les réalisations, nous pouvons introduire des éléments de service en conséquence.

title.en: When you play a table or an electronic game, how much important is each of the following elements?
title.it: Quando giochi (che sia un gioco da tavolo o un gioco elettronico) quanto sono importanti i seguenti elementi?
title.el: Όταν παίζετε ένα τραπέζι ή ένα ηλεκτρονικό παιχνίδι, πόσο σημαντικό είναι κάθε ένα από τα παρακάτω στοιχεία;
title.fr: Lorsque vous jouez à un jeu de table ou à un jeu électronique, quelle est l'importance de chacun des éléments suivants?

scale_title.en: Click or move the slider on the scale from 0 = Not Important/Not Enjoyable to 5 = Very Important / Very Enjoyable
scale_title.it: Tocca o scorri la barra sulla scala da 0: non importante a 5: molto importante
scale_title.el: Κάντε κλικ ή μετακινήστε το ρυθμιστικό στην κλίμακα από 0 = Δεν είναι σημαντικό / δεν είναι ευχάριστο έως 5 = πολύ σημαντικό / πολύ ευχάριστο
scale_title.fr: Cliquez ou déplacez le curseur sur l'échelle de 0 = Pas important / Pas agréable à 5 = Très important / Très agréable

text.en: Be the best or control the game
text.it: Essere il migliore, controllare il gioco
text.el: Να είστε ο καλύτερος ή να ελέγχετε το παιχνίδι
text.fr: Soyez le meilleur ou contrôlez le jeu

text.en: Optimizing your character/card collection as much as possible
text.it: Ottimizzare il più possibile il mio profilo/personaggio
text.el: Optimizing your character/card collection as much as possible
text.fr: Optimizing your character/card collection as much as possible

text.en: Being part of club/guild or special groups
text.it: Essere parte di un gruppo particolare
text.el: Being part of club/guild or special groups
text.fr: Being part of club/guild or special groups

text.en: Play to keep in touch with your friends
text.it: Rimanere in contatto con i miei amici attraverso il gioco
text.el: Play to keep in touch with your friends
text.fr: Play to keep in touch with your friends

text.en: Play to learn about stories, traditions or facts
text.it: Conoscere storie, tradizioni o fatti attraverso il gioco
text.el: Play to learn about stories, traditions or facts
text.fr: Play to learn about stories, traditions or facts

text.en: Go through all the game possible options/places/movements/world
text.it: Esplorare tutte le possibili opzioni / luoghi / movimenti possibili nel campo d’azione
text.el: Go through all the game possible options/places/movements/world
text.fr: Go through all the game possible options/places/movements/world

text.en: In case of a history game, create or recollect your position/character history
text.it: Ricreare o ricostruire la la storia del mio personaggio nel gioco
text.el: In case of a history game, create or recollect your position/character history
text.fr: In case of a history game, create or recollect your position/character history
